alert.note: Alert for Kane; Washington (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 16 at 4:48PM MDT until August 16 at 6:15PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR WESTERN KANE AND EASTERN WASHINGTON COUNTIES... At 448 PM MDT, Zion National Park rangers report flash flooding occurring in Clear Creek, Pine Creek, and Spry Canyon. Doppler radar indicates thunderstorms that have produced heavy rain across the warned area. Between 0.75 and 1.25 inch of rain has fallen. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Trained spotters reported. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks, rivers, slot canyons, and streams. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Clear Creek, Pine Creek, and Spry Canyon in Zion National Park. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
